comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Hi, George! Bain collection has two copies of this same Agence Meurisse photo. Here is the other one: From Meurisse photo at Gallica site (pub. date 1914), caption is: "les Spahis Marocains traversant la forêt de Compiègne" [Moroccan Spahis crossing the forest of Compiègne ] gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90418526

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for linking us to the other copy of this image, and to the original caption and date.  We'll include some of this info next time we update.
